word_mean: 棘皮症，棘皮病，棘层肥厚病：表皮棘层呈弥漫性增生和肥厚，如见于银屑病者。另亦表示无此种增生的弥漫性棘刺感。参见acanthosis nigricans

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To investigate the clinical feature of obese acanthosis nigricans.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 探讨肥胖性黑棘皮病的临床特点.

sentence.Network_en: The overlying epidermis revealed hyperkeratosis and acanthosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 表皮则呈现过度角化及棘皮肥厚.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To explore the high risk factors of metabolic syndrome ( MS ) in obese children acanthosis nigricans.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨肥胖伴黑棘皮病儿童代谢综合征 ( MS ) 的高危因素.
